_source.text: 4. Covering cornerbacks: Junior Brandon Flowers showed last season that he might be the most talented cornerback to have played at Virginia Tech -- better than former NFL first-round pick DeAngelo Hall and second-round choice Jimmy Williams.

text: 4. Covering cornerbacks: Junior Brandon Flowers showed last season that he might be the most talented cornerback to have played at Virginia Tech -- **better** **than** former NFL first-round pick DeAngelo Hall and second-round choice **Jimmy** **Williams**.

_source.text: 8 Buffalo Bills : QB Geno Smith , West Virginia - Smith may not be an elite prospect or in the same class as Andrew Luck or RG3, but will still be miles better than Ryan Fitzpatrick, and the Bills should be sold on this upgrade after Smith put in a solid showing at the Combine.
